entry.title: Frefanac!, Frefanews, and other zines for FreFanZine
entry.summary:
Frefanac!

Frefanac! Vol.1 #1 1975-09 in FreFanZine 1

Clear Ether! FreFanZine zines

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #9 1976-04-24 in FreFanZine 3

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #12 1976-07-08 in CarbAPA4 and FreFanZine 4

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #20 1977-02-11 in APA-NYU 23, LASFAPA 5, and FreFanZine 4 (yes, in the same disty as #12)

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #23 1977-04-06 in APA-NYU 25, LASFAPA 7, and FreFanZine 5

Clear Ether! Vol.2 #26 1977-07-02 in FreFanZine 7

Clear Ether! Vol.3 #1 1978-02 in APA-NYU (March 1978), LASFAPA 17, and FreFanZine 11

Clear Ether! Vol.3 #3 1978-04 in APA-NYU 36, LASFAPA 19, and FreFanZine 12

Clear Ether! Vol.3 #11 1978-09-01 in FreFanZine 14

Frefanews

Frefanews! Vol.2 #2 1984-02-15 in FreFanZine 45

Frefanews! Vol.2 #5 incomplete, pages missing 1984-02-15 in FreFanZine (somewhere after 48)

The rest of issues (maybe under other titles as well) are missing. Check the rest of FreFanZine.
